Display::CustomFrameBuffer

Display::CustomFrameBuffer Class Reference

#include <Apoxi/Devices/Display.hpp>

const Rect & GetBlitRect () const

Detailed Description

Describes a custom frame buffer which can be passed to Display::Refresh to bypass the internal frame buffer. Using this feature is only recommended when the full control of the display is guaranteed.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Display::CustomFrameBuffer::CustomFrameBuffer (  const Bitmap &  bmp,
const Rect &  blit_rect
)  [inline]
 

Parameters:
bmp Bitmap which represents the custom frame buffer. It is recommended that the width of the custom frame buffer is equal to the width of the display, as this usually allows to implement a faster transfer.
blit_rect The blitting rectangle describes the area of the bitmap which should be copied to the display.
